traits.Keen Sight: The hippogriff has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.Multiattack: The hippogriff makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.
actions.Beak: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.
